Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reviewable error in availability of IFA and reasonableness of finding on political persecution
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) sections 96 and 97
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: No credible link between extortion and political activities post-2012
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimonial and documentary evidence regarding police extortion and political involvement
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Political persecution and extortion by Sri Lankan authorities
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Extortion found to be criminally motivated, not politically motivated
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged reviewable error in concluding IFA was available
Crimes.Review_Outcome: No reviewable error found; decision upheld
Crimes.Application_Factor: Relocation to Colombo considered viable due to lack of specific risks
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Availability of Internal Flight Alternative (IFA) and political motivation of harm
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of objective basis for fear of political persecution
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence linking harm to political opinion
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; issue about Tamil Muslims not raised initially
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicants' claims lacked credibility on political nexus
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD’s reasonableness and procedural fairness
Crimes.Relevant_Law: IRPA, case law on refugee determination
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to raise certain issues at RPD level
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to present evidence on treatment of Tamil Muslims

Crimes.Sub_Crime_Type: Threats and assault by state actors
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Repeated threats and demands for money under threat of harm
Crimes.Prior_Criminality: Not applicable to applicants; alleged criminal conduct by police
Crimes.Criminality_Severity: Moderate to high due to abuse of authority and threats
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Partially accepted, but no nexus to political opinion established
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Claims of political involvement not corroborated
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Monetary extortion rather than political suppression
Crimes.Targeted_Victimization: Alleged targeting based on perceived wealth, not political activity
Crimes.Targeted_Individual_Status: Tamil civilians with alleged political affiliations
Crimes.Geographic_Context: Colombo and other parts of Sri Lanka
Crimes.Legal_Provision: IRPA s. 96 (refugee definition), s. 97 (protection from danger)

Crimes.Threat_Source: Police demanding payments under threat of harm
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Repeated demands, abuse of power, ongoing threats
Crimes.Prior_Criminality: Alleged pattern of corrupt behavior by police
Crimes.Criminality_Severity: High due to official misconduct and coercion
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Sufficient to show extortion, insufficient to prove political motive
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Personal testimony, affidavits, country condition documentation
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Credible as to events, but not linked to political opinion
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Events likely occurred but motivations were personal/criminal
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Risk of further extortion if returned
Crimes.Targeted_Individual_Status: Tamil civilians with prior political association (pre-2012)
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Failure to raise Tamil Muslim treatment argument before RPD
Crimes.Legal_Procedure: Federal Court review of administrative decision
